website_summaries.verdict: For the serious athlete or athletic type, this GPS-enabled watch offers top tracking tools to optimize your performance.
pros: Much more than just a heart rate monitor
Built-in GPS keeps track of your ride, run, or hike measuring your speed, distance, and route
Syncs with phone, tablet, or computer for use with Polar Flow app and website to track progress and personalize settings
cons: Heart rate monitor doesn’t really work while swimming

customer_reviews.title: Easy, great web service, accurate
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. I've been running with it for a couple months and have taken my time to make sure I understand how it works. There really isn't anything bad I can say about it. These are my favorite things: 👟 The Polar Flow service is stellar. It's easy to create "phased" runs (warmup, intervals/tempo/fartlex/etc cooldown) 👟 It's recovery module seems pretty accurate. I use TrainAsOne to guide my training and it's like they are in sync. When the watch says I'm ready to run TrainAsOne has one scheduled. So I'm pretty sure they're working on sound principles to make their calculations. 👟 The watch is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: reader runner

customer_reviews.title: So much promise
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful GPS sports watch. It feels very sturdy, the screen is beautiful, and it handles the fitness functions well. Unfortunately, it would keep losing connectivity with my phone, and would stop updating my profile. This also ruined the usefulness of smart notifications, as they would just stop when the watch lost connectivity to the phone. I've used other Polar products before with my phone, so I suspect it is an issue specific to this watch (and might be fixed in a future firmware release). For now, I've returned the watch and gone with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for swimming
customer_reviews.text: The watch was actually pretty nice except for the charging/syncing mechanism which was difficult to work with. For most sports, it would probably be fine, but I bought this specifically because I wanted a heart monitor for swimming. Forget about it. This doesn't work. Not only did it constantly lose my heartbeat, but every time I came off the wall, the strap slipped down my chest. I gave up and took it off after about 30 minutes. Returning it for a refund...
customer_reviews.author: RGS

customer_reviews.title: This has the features I needed. I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has the features I needed. I am a swimmer and this is the only fitness tracker I could find that could track heart rate while swimming. Some others could give you heart rate information on your swim once you were out of the water. I do not care for how it fits on my wrist though. Also, I wish it had built in optical heart rate monitoring. I have the OH-1 optical heart rate sensor that I use with it for some activities, but it is another thing to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: john wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great features, but would not sync with my iPhone7
customer_reviews.text: Great features, but would not sync with my iPhone7. Tried updating the watch and every trick that I could find in the documentation and on the internet. You can connect it directly to a computer, but even that would requires a special adapter on my macbook. The charger/usb connector is really finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother who is a triathlete, and he loves it! he told me the watch is very complete, the measurements are exact, is light weighted, the battery lasts for a long time and it charges very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use. Many workout programs available.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this sports watch. I bought for swimming and wanted to get for the SWOLF scoring and other analytics. It looks like it will be perfect. It’s also billed as the best watch for triathletes. It has programs for cycling, running, swimming and others. And you can customize your workout programs, create favorites, etc. for anyone who wants to measure and help improve their fitness goals.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonG

customer_reviews.title: Charger does not work
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not work at all. I havent used it the first time
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for roughly a month at this point. I have ran, biked, swam, and race motocross while wearing the v800. It is by far the best athletic watch I have ever owned, and when paired with the h7 heart rate sensor the most accurate as well! I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent multisport watch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good watch with sensor H10, battery long time, gps ok, sync fast with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heart Rate plastic lock broke.
customer_reviews.text: The heart rate sensor strap plastic lock broke after a few training sessions. But the V800 is perfect for what I need, I hope Polar replace my band soon.
customer_reviews.author: DEL ALAMO DIEGO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best sport watch in the market... Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: An excellent training tool, with great depth in "phone" apps and server side flow app.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent training tool, with great depth in "phone" apps and server side flow app.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Returning what is a beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: This did not say you needed the monitoring strap to measure any and all heart rate activity. Big let down. Sticking with FITBIT. Returning what is a beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second V 800
customer_reviews.text: My second V800, I hope that it will last longer than 3 years this time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, durable watch
customer_reviews.text: Have these watch now for 5 years! 0 problems still working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Charging problems
customer_reviews.text: My watch doesn't charge anymore, at first I thought it was the cable charger, bought a new one, and the same, it won't charge. Took it to service and they told me me that I have 2 send it to the US, I live in South America. Boomer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This watch is Thee watch to have!
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction. I’ve never found a watch that could take a beating, this one does. I’ve never had a problem with it, and it does a fantastic job at motivating me with all its data it records. I simply love this product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs Wrist Heart Rate Monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: For how expensive this product is, I would think they would have integrated the wrist heart rate monitor.
customer_reviews.author: William Reichle

customer_reviews.title: After a while it shocked me
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a while but then I felt little shocks on my wrist. I stopped using it. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

product_meta.title: Polar V800 GPS Sports Watch
product_meta.description: V800 helps you reach your peak when it you need it most. It integrates GPS and 24/7 activity data for accurate training and recovery data. It has a large, scratch-resistant gorilla glass lens with a high-contrast, black and white display that's optimized for low-light conditions. With unique training features, real-time multisport guidance and in-depth training insights, the V800 is the ultimate choice for the most ambitious triathletes. Key features include: integrated GPS for speed, distance and route tracking, 14 hour rechargeable battery life, altitude, ascent and descent with the barometric altimeter. Also has customizable profiles for multiple sports and seamlessly changes between sports - recording full performance, including transition times. Syncs your workouts to the Polar flow app and web service where you can Plan and analyze your training. Waterproof to 100ft (30M) and suitable for swimming. Includes H7 Bluetooth Smart heart rate sensor for accurate heart rate while training and even while swimming.
feature_bullets: GPS SPORT WATCH: Advanced multisport GPS Watch for serious sports enthusiasts and professional athletes who want to reach peak performance, the built-in GPS keeps track of your ride, run or hike measuring your speed, distance and route
ADVANCED TRAINING WATCH: Create and customize profiles for different sports and get exactly the data and guidance you need for each activity

FITNESS TRACKER: Combines training load with 24/7 activity data for true recovery status. Polar Flow web service compatibility with Mac OS X 10.6, OS X 10.7, OS X 10.8, or later, and PC Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, or later
HEART RATE MONITOR INCLUDED: Use the Polar H7 heart rate sensor while training and even while swimming
TRIATHLON WATCH: Compatibility with Bluetooth Smart running and cycling sensors provide even more details about your training. Compatible third-party power meters
